title: Bug 9654 - Modify Parameters: Dialog details
description: Bug 9654 - Modify Parameters: Dialog details duplicated name validation could be performed on the first page i. the first and second column could be merged j.
OB: a. The buttons on the dialog are too small. b. When the dialog comes up, no table entry is selected. However, both move buttons are enabled. c. When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cut off. d. The dialog comes up huge for methods with many parameters.
EB: a. Buttons on the dialog should have an appropriate size for better usability. b. Upon dialog initialization, a table entry should be automatically selected. Both move buttons should be disabled until a selection is made. c. The preview should display the complete parameter name without any truncation. d. The dialog size should dynamically adjust to accommodate methods with many parameters, ensuring a user-friendly display.
SR: 1. Open the 'Modify Parameters' dialog. 2. Observe the size of the buttons. 3. Note the absence of a selected table entry. 4. Attempt to change a parameter name to a very long one. 5. Observe the preview being cut off. 6. Test with a method having numerous parameters and observe the dialog size.
